sentences.sContent: Women now represent almost 50% of the workforce.
sentences.sCn: 如今女性几乎占全部劳动人口的 50%。

sentences.sContent: The company is cutting its workforce.

synos.tran: 劳动力；工人总数，职工总数

trans.tranCn: 职工总人数， 劳动力
trans.tranOther: all the people who work in a particular industry or company, or are available to work in a particular country or area
